author: cnbc.com
title: Sherwin-Williams Declares Dividend of $0.86 per Common Share
text:
CLEVELAND, Feb. 14, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- The Board of Directors of The Sherwin-Williams Company (NYSE: SHW) today announced a regular quarterly dividend of $0.86 per common share payable on March 9, 2018, to shareholders of record on February 26, 2018. This increase follows 39 consecutive years of dividend increases.
